title: I just went from unranked to Silver l,  does anyone know when will I get my border/frame?

replies.body: *Lew* is correct. Placements don't affect anything at the moment since we've in the time period between two ranked seasons. The new season is just around the corner, though, so keep up the grind and maybe you'll be rocking that Gold ranked-border a year from now. ^.^
Wait does this mean if Im silver 1 during preseason and hit gold 5 before season 7 actually starts will I get gold border?

> [{quoted}](name=Dannesh,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mWsp0EqA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-12-05T17:55:37.732+0000)
>
> Wait does this mean if Im silver 1 during preseason and hit gold 5 before season 7 actually starts will I get gold border?

No this means that season rewards are already done. If you want a reward you will have to wait till the end of next season.
We are in the preseason currently so any rank you earn won't count towards the ranked season rewards.

ya ranked starts on december 7 so if they do it again they can get it next season. No one really cares anyway since people use smurfs all the time (heck this is a burner for the boards) and the icons are kinda so generic/pretentious no one really uses them. Heck I wish they gave an icons like poros or something to denote rank instead of these weird shape stuff. 


Also I prefer challenges in game and being better than someone over some fancy boarder anyway and I think most people only care about your actual skill and anyone that calls you out because you don't have a cosmetic item really shouldn't be listened to anyway. Then again i smurf to help my friends climb since they kinda suck and need coaching to get to even gold with me as their duo. I wish riot hadn't made solo and duo a thing  again now i can't boost them all at once anymore and have to try using other smurfs or use my plat accounts which make it difficult since the mmr system adjusts for it. But o well at least i can get them all that flex stuff together, then the duo stuff.....I hate smurfing just to help friends that bug me to death....but at least i don't get on their accounts like some people do to get those boarders.


Also don't get boosted/buy accounts plz people that stuff pisses me off when you get in a plat or higher game and then someone sucks so bad you want to hit them with a brick and they don't know how to even play passive when they are counter picked. Like i know you are trying to be cool, but you being in a high elo game pisses everyone off when they can tell you are boosted.
